CustomField.formula: IF(legaldeskapp__Status__c = 'OK', 'Your request has been successfully created in Streamline AI. See link to view your request in Streamline AI - ' & legaldeskapp__StreamLineAIURL__c & 'requests/' & legaldeskapp__LegalDesk_Task_Id__c, 'Your request could not be created. Please contact your system administrator.')
CustomField.label: Email Template Message
